description: From its foundation in 2017, Color London LTD has been working in various projects of painting and decorating in London. Our company does painting projects delivering the best quality and our workers are fully qualified to deliver the work at the best standards.

Our philosophy has always been always orientated to commitment, dedication and loyalty towards work – Commitment will bring in dedication, hard work and best results.  With our best skills, experience and effort for the optimal productivity we try and succeed on delivering the final product in the time frame and with no issues to our clients.

We have the capabilities to provide services ranging from full painting and decorating, to more traditional sub-contract jobs. We have a wealth of experience working throughout the sectors providing shell and core, to decorate within the commercial and residential.
Color London is orientated towards respecting all Health and Safety Regulations
